author: Staff Reporter
text:
An air gun was seized from a person by flying squad personnel after intercepting a car near Mappillaioorani here on Saturday. Sub Collector and Returning Officer S. Gopala Sundara Raj said the squad had seized the gun unknowingly since it could be possessed with or without license as the weapon was meant for a shooter of a rifle club here.

The weapon would be handed over to him, he said.
title: Air gun seized
